channel.title: Ilona Maher on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ilona Maher on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How Olympians Stay in the Game (When The Games Are Over)
item.description: For superathletes who wish to be more than a fleeting comet every four years, becoming a content factory is key. Take Ilona Maher: “She’s 50 percent badass rugby player, and 50 percent creator.”

item.title: Ilona Maher Says She’s Been Approached to Join WWE
item.description: The rugby Olympic-medalist made her TV debut last year on ‘Dancing With the Stars.’

item.title: Rugby Star Ilona Maher on Her Go-To Lipstick, Tiny Bikinis and Content Creator Essentials
item.description: The Olympic athlete has recently teamed with TJ Maxx to award sponsorships to 10 game-changing women — here, she reveals what she keeps in her carry-on, her skin care must-haves and more.
